archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Undertake Performance Trend Analysis
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Analyzing the performance trends to identify the performance degradation.

properties.value: â€¢ Undertaking trend analysis, and producing reports, of the performance of resource infrastructure to identify any longer term deterioration; Such trend analysis may be at "macro" level or more detailed granular level such as cell level or any level in between for mobile networks.
